verbs.description: All five [V: living] [ARG0: first ladies] have now criticized the Trump administration 's " zero - tolerance policy " of separating families who cross the border illegally . While current first lady Melania Trump 's statement largely echoed her husband 's decrying the practice , the first ladies all called for it to end .
